<template>
    <form>
      <label for="name">Name</label>
      <input id="name" type="text" placeholder="Name" required>
    </form>
  </template>

  }
  </script>
  
  <style>
  form {
    max-width: 420px;
    margin: 30px auto;
    background: white;
    text-align: left;
    padding: 40px;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  label {
    color: aqua;
    display: block;
    margin: 25px 0 15px;
    font-size: 0.6em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  input {
    display: block;
    padding: 10px 6px;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: none;
    border-bottom: 1px solid gainsboro;
    color: #555;
  }
  </style>
